name: Spliter
description:
A web-themed platformer where you have to build the level. 

The game has two phases: Building and Playing phase
Controls for the Building phase:
Q - Skip timer
W - Move towards the mouse 
Left mouse button - Start or finish making a web

Controls for the Playing phase:
R - Reset level
W - Jump
A/D - Move left or right

Submitted to the Mini Jam 123 and made in three days!
You can play my other games here: My Profile

I also released the source code, where can see my code on Day 1/2/3

Tools I used:
Godot as the game engine
LibreSprite for pixel art
sfxr.me for making the sounds
JummBox for making the music
